projects.title: SoundScene
projects.description: Worked with a team to develop an event discovery and ticketing web application that allows users to explore and attend various events. Implemented features such as RBAC, event browsing, ticket registration, email notifications, and more.

projects.title: This project
projects.description: I built this website to learn more about AWS hosting. The files are stored in a S3 bucket served through CloudFront. It previously had a visitor counter using Lambda and DynamoDB.

projects.title: Payment Request System
projects.description: Multi-role request approval system with a configurable 3-step approval workflow where users can submit and track requests, and those with appropriate roles can submit their approval. Internship project for Likha.

projects.title: Classroom Booking System
projects.description: Developed a full-stack web application designed for managing room reservations across multiple facilities and departments in an educational institution.

projects.title: DFS Route Calculator - BiyaHero
projects.description: Worked with a team to develop a web application which calculates all the routes from a source to a target destination in the Philippine Railway System and EDSA Carousel System utilizing the DFS algorithm.

projects.title: Web Game - Throwmaster
projects.description: Developed a simple web game that promotes proper waste handling habits through engaging gameplay mechanics.

projects.title: Fullstack Blog - booksleeper, a poetry blog
projects.description: Built and designed a full-stack blog website hosted on an AWS EC2 instance with admin authentication using JSON Web Token to access a Management System to handle post creation, modification, and deletion through a REST API.

projects.title: Database Manager - Pasig ScholarDB
projects.description: Worked with a team to develop a database system based on the Pasig City Scholarship Renewal form to store applications and provide centralized storage.

projects.title: OCR Translator - jpOCR
projects.description: Built an application which recognizes Japanese text from a user-selected desktop window using an OCR engine and translates it to English.
